stripped_text: Whenever you draw a Shadow Team, immediately install it. Whenever you initiate a run, trash a card from your grip, if able. When you make a successful run on a central server, destroy Shadow Team.
text:
Whenever you draw a Shadow Team, immediately install it.
Whenever you initiate a run, trash a card from your grip, if able. When you make a successful run on a central server, destroy Shadow Team.
title: Shadow Team
